channel.title: Need help adding npcs... winterlove
channel.description:
I have a problem... Whenever I add this to bottom of autospawn:
spawn = 12 2102 4425 0 0 0 0 0 1 noob train barbarian1 spawn = 12 2101 4428 0 0 0 0 0 1 noob train barbarian2 spawn = 12 2102 4431 0 0 0 0 0 1 noob train barbarian3 spawn = 12 2096 4428 0 0 0 0 0 1 noob train barbarian4
the server does this after compiling: [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/2774/errorgy.jpg[/img]
What else do I have to do to make new npcs??

its aligned fine in notepad… its messed up on here[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2010, 09:54:10 pm[/size][hr]never mind fixed it

item.description:

spawn = 12 2102 4431 0 0 0 0 0 1 noob train barbarian3

so far, this is the new stuff i added. the first 3 work (they arent attackable though)
